
## Calgary's Population by Quadrant (as of 2017)

```{r}
# Libraries

install.packages("dplyr")
library(dplyr)
```


```{r}
# Dataset
data = read.csv("Historical_Community_Populations_20251118.csv")
```


```{r}
table(data$quadrant)
```

```{r}
# create dataframe
dataframe = data.frame(
  population = data$population,
  quadrants = data$quadrant
)

# note: dataframe is already clean
```


```{r}
quadrant_pop = dataframe %>% group_by(quadrants) %>% summarise(sum_pop = sum(population))

quadrant_pop
```
